channel.title: Categories on Gordy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Gordy's Blog

item.title: Hugo Conversion is Working!
item.description:
I have finally gotten around to resurrecting my old test blog blog.gordontillman.info. I was originally using org-octopress which I like. But after it was no longer supported/available I just quit maintaining this blog.

As of today it is now a Hugo blog, currently using the ananke theme. Checkout the source branch of this repo for details.
